OnChallengeQuery.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnChallengeQuery
OnChallengeQuery.description: Called when the challenge options get populated.

OnTickEvenPaused.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnTickEvenPaused
OnTickEvenPaused.description: Same as OnTick, but triggered when the game is paused as well.

OnAIStateExit.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnAIStateExit
OnAIStateExit.description: Triggered when an AI state is exited.

parameters.name: character
parameters.description: The character the state was executed on.

OnConnectFailed.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnConnectFailed
OnConnectFailed.description: Triggered when connection to server has failed.

OnPreMapLoad.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnPreMapLoad
OnPreMapLoad.description: Triggered before a map is loaded.

OnEquipSecondary.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnEquipSecondary
OnEquipSecondary.description: Triggered when a character equips an item in its secondary slot.

parameters.name: character
parameters.description: The character which equipped the item.

OnNewGame.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnNewGame
OnNewGame.description: Triggered after a world is initialized.

parameters.name: square
parameters.description: The square where the player is located.

OnTick.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnTick
OnTick.description: Called every tick, try to not use this one, use EveryTenMinutes instead because it can create a lot of frame loss/garbage collection.

OnInitWorld.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnInitWorld
OnInitWorld.description: Triggered during the process of initializing the world.

OnDisconnect.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnDisconnect
OnDisconnect.description: Triggered when player disconnects from server.

OnEnterVehicle.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnEnterVehicle
OnEnterVehicle.description: Called when [[IsoPlayer]] successfully enters a vehicle.

OnLoadSoundBanks.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnLoadSoundBanks
OnLoadSoundBanks.description: Triggered when sound banks are loaded for the game.

OnPlayerMove.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnPlayerMove
OnPlayerMove.description: Triggered while the player is moving.

OnRightMouseDown.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnRightMouseDown
OnRightMouseDown.description: Triggered when right mouse button is down.

OnPreFillInventoryObjectContextMenu.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnPreFillInventoryObjectContextMenu
OnPreFillInventoryObjectContextMenu.description: Called before context menus get filled with options.

OnFillWorldObjectContextMenu.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnFillWorldObjectContextMenu
OnFillWorldObjectContextMenu.description: Called when world object context menus are filed.

parameters.name: player
parameters.description: The player who will see the menu.

parameters.name: boolean
parameters.description: True if called for the purpose of testing for nearby objects.

OnPostMapLoad.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnPostMapLoad
OnPostMapLoad.description: Triggered after a cell is loaded.

OnCreateSurvivor.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnCreateSurvivor
OnCreateSurvivor.description: Triggered when a survivor is created.

OnPostUIDraw.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnPostUIDraw
OnPostUIDraw.description: Called by UI Manager in its render function after the UI has been drawn.

OnObjectLeftMouseButtonDown.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnObjectLeftMouseButtonDown
OnObjectLeftMouseButtonDown.description: Triggered when left mouse button clicked on [[IsoObject]]

OnCreatePlayer.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnCreatePlayer
OnCreatePlayer.description: Triggered when a player is created.

OnMainMenuEnter.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnMainMenuEnter
OnMainMenuEnter.description: Called when player sees the main menu. This will occur when they launch the game or if they quit a running game.

OnObjectRightMouseButtonDown.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnObjectRightMouseButtonDown
OnObjectRightMouseButtonDown.description: Triggered when right mouse button clicked on [[IsoObject]]

OnScoreboardUpdate.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnScoreboardUpdate
OnScoreboardUpdate.description: Called when multiplayer scoreboard is updated.

OnCharacterCreateStats.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnCharacterCreateStats
OnCharacterCreateStats.description: Triggered when a characters stats are created.

OnAIStateExecute.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnAIStateExecute
OnAIStateExecute.description: Triggered when an AI state executes.

parameters.name: character
parameters.description: The character the state executed on.

OnRefreshInventoryWindowContainers.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnRefreshInventoryWindowContainers
OnRefreshInventoryWindowContainers.description: Triggered during the process of refreshing inventory containers.

parameters.name: string
parameters.description: A string representing the state of the refresh process; can be any of "begin", "beforeFloor", "buttonsAdded", and "end".

parameters.name: integer
parameters.description: denoted key. (See Keyboard Class in java docs for more info.)

OnClothingUpdated.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnClothingUpdated
OnClothingUpdated.description: Triggered when a character's clothing items are updated.

parameters.name: character
parameters.description: The character whose clothing was updated.

OnCreateLivingCharacter.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnCreateLivingCharacter
OnCreateLivingCharacter.description: Called when a player or survivor is being created.

parameters.name: playerOrSurvivor
parameters.description: The player or survivor being created.

parameters.name: survivorDesc
parameters.description: The description of the player or survivor being created.

OnPostFloorLayerDraw.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnPostFloorLayerDraw
OnPostFloorLayerDraw.description: Triggered after a floor layer is rendered.

parameters.name: integer
parameters.description: The Z-index of the layer which was rendered.

OnGameStart.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnGameStart
OnGameStart.description: Called when a new game is started, or loading of a save is finished.

OnObjectLeftMouseButtonUp.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnObjectLeftMouseButtonUp
OnObjectLeftMouseButtonUp.description: Triggered when left mouse button is released on [[IsoObject]]

OnRightMouseUp.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnRightMouseUp
OnRightMouseUp.description: Triggered when mouse button is released.

OnWeaponSwingHitPoint.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnWeaponSwingHitPoint
OnWeaponSwingHitPoint.description: Triggered when a [[HandWeapon]] has hit the apex of its swing.

LevelPerk.title: Modding:Lua Events/LevelPerk
LevelPerk.description: Triggered when a perk is leveled up.

parameters.name: character
parameters.description: The character whose perk is being leveled up.

EveryHours.title: Modding:Lua Events/EveryHours
EveryHours.description: Called every in game hour on the hour.

OnCharacterMeet.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnCharacterMeet
OnCharacterMeet.description: Triggered when a survivor meets another character.

parameters.name: integer
parameters.description: The number of times before this the two characters have met; if it is 0, this is the first time.

parameters.name: integer
parameters.description: denoted key. (See Keyboard Class in java docs for more info.)

OnWeaponHitTree.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnWeaponHitTree
OnWeaponHitTree.description: Triggered when an [[IsoGameCharacter]] uses a [[HandWeapon]] to hit an [[IsoTree]].

OnPreUIDraw.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnPreUIDraw
OnPreUIDraw.description: Called by UI Manager in its render function before the UI gets drawn.

OnLoadMapZones.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnLoadMapZones
OnLoadMapZones.description: Called when IsoWorld initialises and is registering the zones for the map.

OnSpawnRegionsLoaded.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnSpawnRegionsLoaded
OnSpawnRegionsLoaded.description: Triggered after spawn regions are loaded.
OnSpawnRegionsLoaded.additional_info: This event is triggered on the server.

EveryDays.title: Modding:Lua Events/EveryDays
EveryDays.description: Called every in game day at midnight.

OnFETick.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnFETick
OnFETick.description: Same as OnTick, except is only called while on the main menu.

OnGameBoot.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnGameBoot
OnGameBoot.description: Lua event is called when the game/server is started or when mods are reloaded while the game is started.

OnMouseUp.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnMouseUp
OnMouseUp.description: Triggered when mouse button is released.

OnAIStateChange.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnAIStateChange
OnAIStateChange.description: Triggered before an AI state changes.

parameters.name: character
parameters.description: The character that owns the state machine.

OnPlayerCancelTimedAction.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnPlayerCancelTimedAction
OnPlayerCancelTimedAction.description: Triggered when a player cancels a timed action.

OnMouseDown.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnMouseDown
OnMouseDown.description: Triggered when mouse button is down.

OnWeaponHitCharacter.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnWeaponHitCharacter
OnWeaponHitCharacter.description: Triggered when a [[IsoGameCharacter]] has been hit by a [[HandWeapon]]

OnConnected.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnConnected
OnConnected.description: Called when player successfully connects to server.

OnSave.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnSave
OnSave.description: Triggered during the game's saving process.
OnSave.additional_info: The event is triggered after saving ''map_ver.bin'' and ''map_sand.bin'', and just before saving ''map.bin''.

OnPreFillWorldObjectContextMenu.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnPreFillWorldObjectContextMenu
OnPreFillWorldObjectContextMenu.description: Called before context menu for world objects is filled.

parameters.name: player
parameters.description: The player who will see the menu.

parameters.name: boolean
parameters.description: True if called for the purpose of testing for nearby objects.

OnPlayerSetSafehouse.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnPlayerSetSafehouse
OnPlayerSetSafehouse.description: Triggered when survivor group has their safehouse set.

parameters.name: survivorGroup
parameters.description: The survivor group safehouse is being set for.

parameters.name: buildingDef
parameters.description: The building definition of the safehouse being set.

OnObjectRightMouseButtonUp.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnObjectRightMouseButtonUp
OnObjectRightMouseButtonUp.description: Triggered when right mouse button is released on [[IsoObject]]

OnFillInventoryObjectContextMenu.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnFillInventoryObjectContextMenu
OnFillInventoryObjectContextMenu.description: Use the event (as you would 'OnTick' etc) to add items to context menu without mod conflicts.

OnRenderUpdate.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnRenderUpdate
OnRenderUpdate.description: Used to be called every Display.update() but is now obsolete.

OnKeyKeepPressed.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnKeyKeepPressed
OnKeyKeepPressed.description: Called when key is held down.

parameters.name: integer
parameters.description: denoted key. (See Keyboard Class in java docs for more info.)

OnConnectionStateChanged.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnConnectionStateChanged
OnConnectionStateChanged.description: Called at the different stages that a players connection state changes to the server when initially connecting.

OnEquipPrimary.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnEquipPrimary
OnEquipPrimary.description: Triggered when a character equips an item in its primary slot.

parameters.name: character
parameters.description: The character which equipped the item.

EveryTenMinutes.title: Modding:Lua Events/EveryTenMinutes
EveryTenMinutes.description: Called every ten in game minutes.

OnJoypadActivate.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnJoypadActivate
OnJoypadActivate.description: Triggered when a controller is activated.

parameters.name: integer
parameters.description: The ID of the activated controller.

OnAIStateEnter.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnAIStateEnter
OnAIStateEnter.description: Triggered when an AI state is entered.

parameters.name: character
parameters.description: The character the state will execute on.

OnKeyStartPressed.title: Modding:Lua Events/OnKeyStartPressed
OnKeyStartPressed.description: Called when key is initially pressed.

parameters.name: integer
parameters.description: denoted key. (See Keyboard Class in java docs for more info.)
